name: Vinylove
description: Vinylove's a short adventure experience about the connection between music and memories. Relax and play your own records while helping Alex cope with his own lifetime memories. Will you pick the right songs?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Processor >= 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
